name: Riparian Extent
functionStatement: Organic matter and primary production are captured and processed, fueling food webs and balancing production/respiration.
descriptionMarkdown: Riparian vegetation condition and composition influencing organic matter inputs, bank stability, and habitat quality.
methodContextMarkdown:
Context: Riparian/Floodplain

Method: Field and/or Desktop (imagery/GIS)
howToMeasureMarkdown: Measure riparian corridor attributes (extent, cover, composition, stem density, basal area) per SQT guidance and apply stratified thresholds (valley type/region).

inputs.label: Riparian Extent
inputs.helpMarkdown: Riparian vegetation field plots and/or GIS/imagery-based corridor metrics.

references: local vegetation plot protocols where applicable
